Docs.param: The string representing either the entire event query or the name of the event class to query. The object will try to parse the string as a valid event query. If unsuccessful, the parser will assume that the parameter represents an event class name.

MemberSignature.Value: public WqlEventQuery (string eventClassName, TimeSpan withinInterval);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string eventClassName, valuetype System.TimeSpan withinInterval) cil managed

new System.Management.WqlEventQuery : string * TimeSpan -> System.Management.WqlEventQuery

Docs.param: The name of the event class to query.

A value specifying the latency acceptable for receiving this event. This value is used in cases where there is no explicit event provider for the query requested, and WMI is required to poll for the condition. This interval is the maximum amount of time that can pass before notification of an event must be delivered.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified event class, with the specified latency time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性 对直接调用方的完全信任。 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。 ## Examples 下面的示例创建的事件查询:"选择 * 从 __InstanceCreationEvent *WITHIN* 10 其中 TargetInstance ISA Win32_Service"，这将创建的通知发送**Win32_Service**情况下的，使用 10 秒轮询间隔。 [!code-csharp[wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S/cs/WqlEventQuery-S_T_S.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S/vb/WqlEventQuery-S_T_S.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Usage: new System.Management.WqlEventQuery (eventClassName, withinInterval, condition, groupWithinInterval, groupByPropertyList, havingCondition)

Docs.param: The name of the event class on which to be queried.

A value specifying the latency acceptable for receiving this event. This value is used in cases where there is no explicit event provider for the query requested, and WMI is required to poll for the condition. This interval is the maximum amount of time that can pass before notification of an event must be delivered.
The condition to apply to events of the specified class.
The specified interval at which WMI sends one aggregate event, rather than many events.
The properties in the event class by which the events should be grouped.
The condition to apply to the number of events.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified event class name, condition, grouping interval, grouping properties, and specified number of events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性 对直接调用方的完全信任。 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。 ## Examples 下面的示例创建的事件查询:"选择 * 从 __InstanceCreationEvent 其中 TargetInstance ISA Win32_NTLogEvent 组内 600 通过 TargetInstance.SourceName HAVING NumberOfEvents > 15"它提供了聚合事件，仅当的数字**Win32_NTLogEvent**超过 15 个接收到来自相同来源的事件。 [!code-csharp[wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S_T_S_S#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S_T_S_S/cs/WqlEventQuery-S_T_S_T_S_S.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S_T_S_S#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S_T_S_S/vb/WqlEventQuery-S_T_S_T_S_S.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the condition to be applied to events of the specified class.
Docs.value: 返回值，该值包含条件在事件查询。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性的值将覆盖任何以前的值存储在对象中。 重新生成的查询字符串以反映新的条件。 ## 属性值 条件表示为字符串，包含窗体的一个或多个子句： \\<运算符 >\<值 > 结合逻辑运算符。 \ 必须表示在此查询中指定的事件类上定义的属性。 ## .NET Framework 安全性 对直接调用方的完全信任。 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。 ## Examples 下面的示例初始化新和显示的事件查询字符串。 [!code-csharp[wminet_WqlEventQuery_Condition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery_Condition/cs/WqlEventQuery_Condition.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_WqlEventQuery_Condition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery_Condition/vb/WqlEventQuery_Condition.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the polling interval to be used in this query.
Docs.value: 返回查询在事件使用包含的轮询间隔的值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只应在用例中设置此属性没有任何*事件提供程序*请求的事件，并且 WMI 需轮询请求的条件。 设置此属性的值将覆盖任何以前的值存储在对象中。 重新生成的查询字符串以反映新的时间间隔。 ## 属性值 Null，如果没有轮询涉及到;否则为是有效时轮询是必需的值。 ## .NET Framework 安全性 对直接调用方的完全信任。 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。 ## Examples 下面的示例初始化新表示查询:"选择 * 从 __InstanceCreationEvent *WITHIN* 1 WHERE TargetInstance ISA Win32_Process'"。 [!code-csharp[wminet_WqlEventQuery_WithinInterval#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery_WithinInterval/cs/WqlEventQuery_WithinInterval.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_WqlEventQuery_WithinInterval#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery_WithinInterval/vb/WqlEventQuery_WithinInterval.vb#1)]
